mapper.update: update post set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, send_time = now(), confirm_time = now(), type = #{type}, status = #{status} where post_name = #{post_name}
mapper.select: select u.nickName, u.avatarUrl, p.* from user_msg u, post p where p.status = #{status} and p.type = #{type} and p.userId = u.userId order by p.confirm_time desc
select url from post_pic where upload_name = #{postName} limit 0, 1
